full_summary:
### [Government Tender Announcement](https://example.gov)

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Title
Two (2) Courseware Developers, Level 2 and Two (2) Web Graphics Designer, Level 2

#### Solicitation Number
W6369-23-X025

#### Reference Number
W6369-23-X025

#### Date of Publication
January 16, 2023

#### Closing Date and Time
February 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

#### Solicitation Method
Competitive

#### Applicable Trade Agreements
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Contract Details
- Contract duration: 1 year with an optional extension up to 3 additional years
- Estimated duration: 240 days each

#### Description of Work
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires two (2) Courseware Developers, Level 2 and two (2) Web Graphics Designers, Level 2 to support the development and update of training materials and assets for the DRMIS and SAP systems.

### Procurement Requirements
- The work requires Intermediate-level expertise in courseware development and web graphics design.
- Security clearance: custom SRCL, Protected B.
- Contracting Authority: Rogelio Orsetti, Rogelio.Orsettipetrocelli@forces.gc.ca.
- Please submit any inquiries to the contracting authority.

### Important Notes
- Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply is refreshed three (3) times a year.
- "Buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
- French language is also an option for submitting proposals.

#### Contact
To become a qualified Supply Arrangement Holder, contact: RCNMDAI.-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca. 
#### Security Classification
- This tender is restricted
